file(GLOB_RECURSE VKBOOTSTRAP_HEADERS CONFIGURE_DEPENDS
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB_RECURSE VKBOOTSTRAP_SOURCES CONFIGURE_DEPENDS
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.cpp")

add_library(vkbootstrap ${VKBOOTSTRAP_HEADERS} ${VKBOOTSTRAP_SOURCES})
target_include_directories(
    vkbootstrap
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${LUMI_THIRDPARTY_DIR}/vkbootstrap>
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${Vulkan_INCLUDE_DIRS}>
    )
